name: Nidoran ♀

attacks.name: Fury Swipes
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Call for Family
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Basic Pokémon named Nidoran ♂ or Nidoran ♀ and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward. (You can't use this attack if your Bench is full.)

flavorText: Although small, its venomous barbs make this Pokémon dangerous. The female has smaller horns.

strengths: 60 HP is good for a Basic
Call for Family can search for both Nidoran genders
synergies: Nidoking evolution line (via Nidoran M search)

competitiveHistory: Nidoran ♀ from Jungle was used as a basic for the Nidoqueen evolution line. Call for Family helped set up the Nidoking/Nidoqueen combo deck.

rulings.ruling: Call for Family can search for either Nidoran ♂ or Nidoran ♀, but only puts one onto the Bench.
